trans-unit.source: Derivative of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidator"></xref> that is the base class for all composite activity validator components.
trans-unit.target: Härledda av <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidator"> </xref> som är basklass för alla komponenter för sammansatta aktiviteten verifieraren.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The class provides validation logic for a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.CompositeActivityValidator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.CompositeActivityValidator"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: This method calls Validate on every child <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.EnabledActivities%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden anropas Validate på varje underordnad <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>i den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.EnabledActivities%2A>samling.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.EnabledActivities%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>

trans-unit.source: It also checks that no more than one <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CancellationHandlerActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlersActivity>, or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensationHandlerActivity> is attached to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Den kontrollerar också som fler än en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CancellationHandlerActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlersActivity>, eller också <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensationHandlerActivity>är kopplat till <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensationHandlerActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlersActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CancellationHandlerActivity>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"></xref> of errors found during validation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"> </xref> av fel som hittas under verifieringen.

trans-unit.source: obj is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: objär en null-referens ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Validates the change based on the affected <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> and provides the error.
trans-unit.target: Verifierar ändringen baserat på de berörda <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> och ger felet.

trans-unit.source: If validation occurs without error, a null reference (`Nothing`) is returned.
trans-unit.target: Om valideringen sker utan fel, en null-referens (`Nothing`) returneras.

trans-unit.source: action is a null reference ().
